attributes.title: Donald trump hit my rock!
attributes.review: I was out walking my pet rock, then I see a huge line of the president’s cars and the security guards threw my pet rock onto the road, they killed my pet! July 1st-July 4th. Please do not have a rock next the the president.

attributes.title: would give 0 stars if i could

attributes.title: Poorly Designed
attributes.review: One of the worst apps I’ve ever used, a kindergartner must of designed this. Save your time and energy and avoid this app completely. 😌
